thread.title: BRIEF-Impresa Q4 Ebitda Down 23.5 Pct At 5.2 Mln Euros YoY

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Impresa Q4 Ebitda Down 23.5 Pct At 5.2 Mln Euros YoY
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - IMPRESA SGPS SA:
* Q4 NET LOSS 21.5 MILLION EUROS VERSUS PROFIT 3.3 MILLION EUROS YEAR AGO
* Q4 NET PROFIT WITHOUT IMPAIRMENTS 1.7 MILLION EUROS VERSUS 3.3 MILLION EUROS YEAR AGO
* Q4 EBITDA 5.2 MILLION EUROS VERSUS 6.8 MILLION EUROS YEAR AGO
* Q4 REVENUE 55.4 MILLION EUROS VERSUS 56.2 MILLION EUROS YEAR AGO
* Q4 AD REVENUE 34.8 MILLION EUROS VERSUS 34.0 MILLION EUROS YEAR AGO Source text: bit.ly/2oXOQhY
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
